text: Yara imana eneche ebam satkaja kareche tara age ya kichu panahara kareche tara jan'ya tadera kono gunahâ€Œ ne'i, yadi tara taka'oya abalambana kare, imana ane ebam satkaja kare. Tarapara tara taka'oya abalambana kare ebam imana ane. Tarapara tara taka'oya abalambana kare ebam ihasana kare. Ara allaha muhasinaderake bhalabasena
